SetupGuide.Attendance.PremiumFeatures.Co:
Customise your first compliance ruleset to ensure compliance with the following scheduling related legal requirements:
  • Daily/Weekly overtime
  • Break Scheduling
  • Penalty hours for time worked during specific times of the week
  • Time worked across the maximum number of consecutive days without rest
  • Time worked on public holidays

Configure settings to enable:
  • Early and unscheduled shifts
  • Photos for clock events
  • Mobile Time Clock
  • Tips and sales capture on clock out
